CustomField.formula: OR( ISBLANK(Name), ISBLANK(BillingStreet), ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode), ISBLANK(BillingCity), ISBLANK(BillingCountry), ISBLANK(vat_number__c), ISPICKVAL(legalForm_id__c,""), ISBLANK(PartnerPaymentBank__c), ISBLANK(PartnerPaymentIBAN__c), ISBLANK(PartnerPaymentBIC__c), ISBLANK(Credit_Note_Recipient_Name__c), ISBLANK(Credit_Note_Recipient_Email__c), IF(BillingCountry = 'DE',ISPICKVAL(TaxExempt__c,""),false))
CustomField.label: PartnerMissingPaymentData
